full_text: @MaliksZafar Hi Malik - You have reached the U.S. Twitter page. Please provide us with your email, phone number, and country so we can connect you with a team in your region.

Kudos to our Morristown, TN team for a Quality Week innovation with heart. They applied rigorous Quality Assurance tools to assembling bicycles. The result: stronger QA skills at the plant and 23 smiles from needy kids now riding the donated bikes. More: https://t.co/Ah5IJ4HYUL https://t.co/pmtSHrMcQ4

Who’s #recycling old electric toothbrushes into products like park benches? Colgate Australia in a pioneering partnership with @TerraCycle!
